hero.title: Clean Water, Naturally
hero.tagline: JellyGuard uses nature-inspired technology to protect marine intake systems from jellyfish blooms without harm or chemicals

opening.title: The Challenge
opening.text: Coastal facilities worldwide face operational shutdowns when jellyfish swarms clog cooling-water intakes. Traditional barriers harm marine life and require intensive maintenance. JellyGuard offers a smarter solution.

promise.title: Our Promise
promise.text: A passive, biomimetic system that gently lifts jellyfish away from intake zones and concentrates them in a thin surface layer for safe removal - without toxic coatings, moving parts, or ecosystem disruption.

globalImpact.title: Global Impact
globalImpact.subtitle: JellyGuard addresses a worldwide problem
left: Jellyfish blooms shut down power plants, desalination facilities, and industrial cooling systems
Climate change and warming seas intensify bloom frequency and scale
Existing solutions often damage marine ecosystems or prove economically unsustainable
right: Our technology works in harmony with ocean currents and natural behavior
Protects both infrastructure and marine biodiversity

steps.label: Sense
steps.description: Detect jellyfish presence and water flow patterns

steps.label: Lift
steps.description: Gently guide jellyfish upward using natural buoyancy

steps.label: Skim
steps.description: Concentrate organisms in a thin surface layer

steps.label: Process
steps.description: Safe removal or bypass without harm

items.title: Eco-Friendly
items.description: No chemicals, no entrapment, no ecosystem damage

items.title: Scalable
items.description: Modular design adapts to small intakes or large industrial facilities

items.title: Proven Approach
items.description: Inspired by natural marine processes and validated through rigorous testing

whoWeServe.title: Who We Serve
whoWeServe.primary: Power generation facilities, desalination plants, industrial cooling systems, and marine infrastructure operators facing jellyfish-related intake challenges.
whoWeServe.secondary: We also partner with environmental agencies, marine research institutions, and coastal developers seeking sustainable intake protection.

siteRequirements.title: Minimal Site Requirements
siteRequirements.intro: JellyGuard integrates seamlessly with existing infrastructure:
items: Basic site assessment and water flow data
Standard mounting surfaces or anchoring points
Access for periodic inspection (frequency based on bloom patterns)

commercialModel.title: Commercial Model
commercialModel.text: We offer flexible deployment options including full installation, lease agreements, and performance-based contracts. Our team conducts site assessments, custom design, installation, and ongoing monitoring to ensure optimal protection and ROI.

safetyEcology.title: Safety & Ecology
safetyEcology.text: JellyGuard is designed with marine conservation at its core. Our system avoids entrapment, uses no biocides or anti-fouling chemicals, and allows safe passage for non-target species. We work closely with environmental regulators and marine biologists to ensure compliance and minimal ecological footprint.
